    • Method Detail

      • click

        public CrawlElement click(String tagName)
        Set of HTML elements Crawljax will click during crawling For exmple 1) 2)
        click("a") will only include 1 if clickOnce is true (default). This set can be restricted by dontClick(String).
        Parameters:
        tagName - the tag name of the elements to be included
        Returns:
        this CrawlElement

      • click

        public void click(String... tagNames)
        Set of HTML elements Crawljax will click during crawling For exmple 1) 2)
        click("a") will only include 1 This set can be restricted by dontClick(String). If no clicks are specified, clickDefaultElements() is enabled.
        Parameters:
        tagNames - the tag name of the elements to be included

      • clickDefaultElements

        public void clickDefaultElements()
        Specifies that Crawljax should click all the default clickable elements. These include: All anchor tags All buttons

      • dontClick

        public CrawlElement dontClick(String tagName)
        Set of HTML elements Crawljax will NOT click during crawling When an HTML is present in the click and dontClick sets, then the element will not be clicked. For example: 1) Some text 2) 3)
        click("a") dontClick("a").withAttribute("class", "foo"); Will include only include HTML element 2
        Parameters:
        tagName - the tag name of the elements to be excluded
        Returns:
        crawlTag the CrawlElement

      • dontClickChildrenOf

        public CrawlActionsBuilder.ExcludeByParentBuilder dontClickChildrenOf(String tagname)
        Click no childer of the specified parent element.
        Parameters:
        tagname - The tagname of which no children should be clicked.
        Returns:
        The builder to append more options.
